content.html: I made a book! It got shortlisted for an award! It's red! PDF version is here: sparkleclass.files.wordpress.com/2021/05/autist…
content.value:
I made a book!

It got shortlisted for an award!

It's red!

PDF version is here: sparkleclass.files.wordpress.com/2021/05/autist…

photo.alt: 3 books which say "How to treat autistic people - your guide to effective communication". Actually, "booklet" would be more accurate. It's basically one joke stretched over 24 pages. You can have one if you like, as your reward for reading the alt text.
